message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $13,500. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is significantly below its true worth. I could consider letting it go for $12,000. This is a very fair offer considering the value you'll gain.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
